website_summaries.verdict: Brings a modern-industrial update to dining rooms and other medium-sized spaces in the home. While the styling is a big attraction, a few flaws including bent parts mar an otherwise good lighting fixture that costs much less than similar chandeliers.
pros: Great light – 40 watts is almost too bright
Some users installed it on a dimmer switch with corresponding LED bulbs for better light control
damage in shipping wasn’t an issue for users
cons: Some users were unable to get the light to hang up straight, and others weren't happy with the workmanship
Instructions were not clear, leaving some users confused on how to install the ceiling fixture

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light and TOTALLY a good deal!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is beautiful and a great deal for the price- it's substantial in size and puts off a great a mount of light- DEFINITELY recommend!!!!! My husband installed it himself and there was a very little swearing (which is my general sliding scale to rate the difficulty of home improvement projects with him).
customer_reviews.author: Faith Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture. What a great price. I've seen some that were twice as much for the same look. There's plenty of chain if you need it to hang longer. I put one in the foyer and I'm putting another above my kitchen island. I used 5 40 watt LED bulbs and it gives off a ton of light.
customer_reviews.author: Toledo mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this and finally decided to order it. Was nervous about the quality but I’m glad I just went for it! I get a lot of compliments on it and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tammey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money....
customer_reviews.text: We hung this in our entryway. Ours was not bent (as others have mentioned) but we didn't get a bolt that was supposed to be included and a couple of the light bulbs did not screw in completely. Definitely not the best qualify but all in all very nice looking and worth the money. I took one star off for the quality and the horrible instructions. If you didn't have an idea how to hang a lighting fixture, you'd be totally lost with what was provided. Finally we used 40 watt bulbs and found it was way way too bright. Like sun lamp bright. So we're planning to change out the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: INDALU

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Fine. However, pieces needed to be "tweaked" due to it being bent or crooked. Not shipping damage either, just poor worksmanship. Also the cable cover that runs up and through the chain is huge. I mean really big, almost to big to fit through the links.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic piece that immediately added a modern, farmhouse feel. I do not have farmhouse decor but this fits perfectly with all my other fixtures. The LED lights I use are a warm LED but you could use a bright LED as well. I tried both but I prefer the warm color. This light gave such an immediate modern updated feel to the room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Statement piece, love this
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the previous reviewer, I decided to give this a go. Glad I did. Love this in my front entry way! It's say black on the description, but it's bronze. The guy installed it in less than 15 minutes. So instructions must've been pretty clear. It does not come with lights, I bought the flame tip clear lights on Amazon as well. Love this piece! Wish this seller made more so I can get one got my lounge area.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte' Moss

customer_reviews.title: Some problems but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the small ceiling plate...would’ve been nicer if it was a bit more substantial. Hard to get screws into the ceiling plate. Was missing the piece to attach the chain to the ceiling plate. My husband is vey resourceful so it wasn’t end of the world. And not sure if it’s me but it looks ovalish and I think the picture looks more like a sphere..circle? Anyways. Wilt hall that that sounds bad it’s still very nice and cheaper than what you would get at Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: NLL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Bronze and it’s black didn’t even have an option for a different color when I ordered it. Doesn’t have a ground wire. Feels like it’s hanging by the wire and not the chain and not symmetrical. The outside plate screws that should be black to match are silver. The one I ordered was same one a friend has and this is not the same design or color. This one has black holes on the side nothing like ordered. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JHuffman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this chandelier. Very easy to install - my husband did it by himself. As other reviewers mentioned, the inside part that holds the light bulb on ours is a little off centered but you can't tell unless you are looking for it. The size and color are perfect for our dinning room.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. Wrapped in nothing but a plastic bag-no buffer ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Wrapped in nothing but a plastic bag-no buffer between the light and the box. Paint chipped and falling off in my hands and all of the arms bent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome in our "steampunk" library. I use that term loosely, lol. The light adds impact because its different from the typical chandelier. It would look equally nice with farmhouse style, rustic, and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Net Tech

customer_reviews.title: Nice light fixture. The candle holders are a little off centered.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fixture. Good quality chain links as it has the easy to open end links (unlike other products i have seen). The only thing is the candle holders are slightly bent. I dont know if this is the vintage look or a defect. I tried to bend back but it doesnt give much.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money, not quite straight
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the money. The lights don't quite line up with the round globe, so you have to bend it. But it looks nice and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DDR1981

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the correct bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this chandelier! It did come damaged but with the help of some pliers I was able to bend the soft metal back into place. I installed it myself, but I am comfortable with trimming and stripping wires and have installed all of the light fixtures in my home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Lightbulbs not included
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are not included for this light and there are no bulbs available in the stores that will fit it. The small ones are too small and the intermediate ones are too big. Sadly, I did not discover this until it was too late to return it. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AMY BURGE

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality but attractive
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with some damage but we were able to bend it back that it wasn’t overly noticeable. Otherwise it’s nice for the price, not high quality, but it’s looks attractive, installed easily and works great well.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning, kinda a light weight, and a couple of the bulb holders (candles) were bent and I had to bend them into the correct position. We decided it wasn't the right fixture for us and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. The candelabra is a bit tilted inside the globe. Overall it has a cheap feel to it. I put it up but I don’t love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Khan

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this. 1 light is not working! the lights are not centered. would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous fixture at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture. It is hanging in our foyer and everyone loves it. Perfect size for the foyer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: but overall it is very pretty and complements my space perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a really gorgeous light! It doesn't sit 100% straight, which kind of annoys me, but overall it is very pretty and complements my space perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this chandelier! I was so excited when it got here and just got around to open it to put it up and bam...the light fixture is completely bent and damaged. I’m so sad, I’ve been waiting to get a light put up for months. I’ve contacted seller and am hopeful for a replacement and will update review if made right.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeen

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but seems slightly off shape when you look closely. One candle stick seems bent out a little far. You only notice if you are looking so not worth uninstalling and returning
customer_reviews.author: Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is super cute but arrived damaged. We didn't notice the damage until it was hung up and the packaging was long gone.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy42

customer_reviews.title: Love the light,
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture: But when I took it out of the box it was bent:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to hang, per my brother, without difficulty. It doesn't specify which light size to buy, but I ended up with 40 volt flame bulbs. Much brighter than my previous light fixture. We ended up adding a dimmer switch and it made my kitchen come together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Camazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for our foyer. I see similar products for over $200. Great light at a great price! It looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H Dziadon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Good quality. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Easy to install. As shown. Check the measurements so that you can have a visual on how it will look. It’s not a big lamp but very nice. I’m using this in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: No ground wire
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions were not included. How do you tell which wire is hot? Blue or Orange? Also, no ground wire with the fixture so I don't feel comfortable installing. And can't return. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: LVG

customer_reviews.title: Larger than description but nice
customer_reviews.text: Interestingly, I feel like my item is a slightly different product. It is much larger than described at 21”x20” and the candle holders are shorter and wider. It’s still very nice but a bit larger than I wanted. Arrived in good shape and didn’t need to be put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We've had several good compliments on this light. It also is very bright with 5 lights so you can use less LED wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Tom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Not only was it easy to install but it looks just as fabulous as I had hoped it would! You get what you see, in the best way possible! I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Bolt not long enough but looks good
customer_reviews.text: The fixture looks great however the issue is with the installation. The bolt used to thread the wires through and secure it is significantly shorter than it should be. Since it's a custom made hollow bolt, you can't just go buy one at the store. I got it barely threaded on and have secured it on my own, but for anyone without MacGyver skills you'll be upset during installation. Otherwise it looks really nice and is lightweight. The wires are longer than the chain, it isn't really 6', so beware you'll need to secure them at the top with a black zip tie or push a ton of them up into your ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Toler

customer_reviews.title: nice but even measuring, it is larger than imagined.
customer_reviews.text: It is fine, but the bulbs aren't a standard chandelier type nor a regular size. Going to have to go the Batteries and Bulbs and hope they carry them. There were no instructions but that wasn't a problem. The bulb size should be included in the paperwork...but we didn't get any paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Imlay

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after reading other reviews that they received theirs damaged, but I took a chance and it paid off. Very happy with my purchase and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light. I had a basic stainless steel light in my dining room before I changed it, and I love the look of this. It’s very different! My husband said it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Depault

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: We installed the lights in our private school entry and they not only look great but give the needed light!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: custom bulbs
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i didn't like about this was the non-standard sized bulbs needed. but with some edison bulbs in, this piece looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with trendy look!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture! Arrived quickly! Easy to install! Great quality and looks perfect in my dining room!
customer_reviews.author: K. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my front hall and it's just what I expected, it looks nice and updates the hall.It doesn't weigh as much as I thought it would and is a little bigger than I thought. the directions for installation are pretty useless...but we did do it ourself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful master bedroom light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I received the light fixture really fast, it’s already assembled and needed to be just installed with wasn’t hard at all. Looks beautiful in our remodel master bedroom, received a lot of compliments from friends. Over all very happy with this light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia Murcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for what we wanted! It is nice and bright for the space and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mishelle

customer_reviews.title: Attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same chandelier for kitchen and dining room. Love them and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This light is exactly what we wanted! We updated a room and are using it over a staircase. You see it on tv similar to this as many fixer upper shows use this. Everyone comments who visits!
customer_reviews.author: BRma

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These replaced old shabby cut glass chandeliers that came with our house 11 years ago, and completely changed the feel of the room. They installed easily, provide great light with LED bulbs and are easy to keep dust-free.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really beautiful light fixture. It looks great in my new kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Standard E12 bulbs are too small
customer_reviews.text: Had to order European E14 bulbs, standard candelabra bulbs were too small.
customer_reviews.author: MZ7YQY

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, modern and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, modern and elegant. It comes with 3 wires and the regular ground copper wire. Instructions are very poor and hard to understand when trying to figure out what to connect if you have just 2 wires in your home.
customer_reviews.author: JNM

customer_reviews.title: ... to one side which is noticeable but I still love the chandelier
customer_reviews.text: After hanging it the entire thing leans to one side which is noticeable but I still love the chandelier!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Patzkowsky

customer_reviews.title: very bright
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, we replaced the lights with LED Edison chandelier bulbs. Original bulbs were very bright. No assembly required other than mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Davis

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected and is the perfect edition to our dining room
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected and is the perfect edition to our dining room. The price point was perfect for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristiane Spires-Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This light completed our farmhouse look in our dining room! Fast delivery too!!
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Item Came Bent
customer_reviews.text: The fixture came bent. My installation guy was able to fix the damage, so it ended up working out.
customer_reviews.author: Camisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking at good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these lights and like them well enough. There are much sturdier lights out there, but for the price I think these will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lit Lighting!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful and impressive chandelier for our kitchen! Love it!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Noakes

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this light! Definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa F. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great dinning room light.
customer_reviews.text: Looks really great over the dining room table. Easy to install. Comes with a long chain. Easy to shorten and lower the chain.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install really nice contemporary light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Great way to update a room without spending a lot of money !
customer_reviews.author: marc snow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent/Beautiful-LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love my light! It's beautiful. Once I received it, I liked it so much I ordered another one! The only thing is that I wish they would have packed it a little better to protect it in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fixture
customer_reviews.text: Really cute modern lamp for our new farmhouse style family room. Deducted one star because it hangs crooked Still a really nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: LaurieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love this lite so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this light I put it over my bed to create a farm style. Love it, brightness is amazing and looks so nice
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it, had to bend a few pieces back in shape to get the center fairly straight. Good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kutra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our mudroom and it's exactly the look and style I was going for -modern farmhouse. Definitely recommend if that's the style you are after!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: The light is beautiful and inexpensive. However, some of the parts were bent and damaged when opened because of the quality. Once bent back and installed, it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy, great product
customer_reviews.text: Stunning quality product, absolutely love it! Make my living room totally beautiful. Lighting is romantic and bright with the five bulbs. Recommend installing a dimmer for this
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this light in our kitchen over our table
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this light in our kitchen over our table. It looks nice and gives off a good amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBellaRoo

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful & can’t beat the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I had expected due to the price I looked at Lowe’s, Menards, Home Depot and pricing was so high for smaller fixtures super impressed and easy to install!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this chandelier! So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. On the smaller side. Dimmer works well with my caseta WiFi dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived in good condition , but the product was damaged. It is sad since the piece was beautiful, I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amrit

customer_reviews.title: Cherry on the Top.  Really!
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh ...What do I say. So many compliments!! It's is an eye catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my dining room. Great size and quality

customer_reviews.title: Great enhancement to my room
customer_reviews.text: Look awesome in this space being used as office for my husband. He is even pleased
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and great price
customer_reviews.text: High quality beautiful piece. Perfect for the farmhouse industrial trendy look that everyone is doing. Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: WashedUpWild

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for what we wanted! It is nice and bright for the space and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Nkarbo257

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install, gives great farmhouse look to any room
customer_reviews.author: Emily Haines

customer_reviews.title: Not extremely difficult to assemble.  Looks amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not too tough to assemble, and mounts well to the sloped ceiling. Looks amazing in place, makes the whole kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lighting!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this light is great! It is a wonderful size and plenty of light emits from it. Very classy!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Smith-Mathewes

customer_reviews.title: Does work with light dimmer if you get the correct bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Looks more expensive than the cost, easy to install, and you can adjust it to any height! Perfect in our dinning room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture and a great price
customer_reviews.text: After I installed it, my wife was very happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my dining room
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous and an absolute steal for the price! Perfect addition to my dining room. Not too small and not overly big, either.

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! Looks great in my dining room. Its very bright though, needs a dimmer or low voltage light bulbs.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp and puts out a ton of light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture, I just wish I would have purchased a bigger one for my dining room.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: Item came a bit bent, but was easy bend back into place. Not top quality, but good enough for the price. Looks nice.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, just a tad tricky to install but very happy overall.

customer_reviews.text: Did not like that the dimensions were not printed when ordering. Had to hope size was good!

customer_reviews.text: Great light, but too small for our dinette area. Would possibly work for a very small foyer or room.

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Industrial Vintage Hanging 5-Light Ceiling Chandelier Fixture for Living Room, Bedroom - Bronze
product_meta.description:
Add a unique look to any setting with this vintage chandelier. The industrially-inspired design uses steel rods in a sleek ball form for a piece that's sure to stand out. Transform the entire look of your living room and let it shine with eye-catching style.

Specifications:
Cord Length: 59.5"
Ball: 16"(W) x 15.25"(H)
Weight: 5.75 lbs.
Material: Steel
UL-certified luminaires
Uses 40W bulbs (not included)
Professional installation recommended
Assembly required (with instructions)

BCP SKU: SKY2406
feature_bullets: BOLD DESIGN: Adds a stylish, vintage look to your home and room decor
VERSATILE USES: Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, and even commercial settings like hotel rooms and restaurants
ADJUSTABLE 59.5-INCH CHAIN: Hangs elegantly over your stairway or foyer with a sturdy, adjustable chain
5-LIGHT CHANDELIER: Holds five 40-watt light bulbs (not included)
UL-CERTIFIED LUMINAIRES: Meets safety standards and made to last for years to come

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars208 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
